name: TimeTravelers
description: 「We got the remains of someone's dream in the end」 Short musical movie about two girls who travel to magical space!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
